text: Ardooie is a municipality in the Belgian province of West Flanders. The municipality includes the towns of Ardooie and Koolskamp. In 2006, Ardooie had a total population of 9,147. The local people are called Ardooienaren. It is at 50° 58 North, 03° 11 East. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Municipalities of West Flanders
title: Ardooie
